ygData.subject: RE: I feel a nerf a coming...
ygData.msgSnippet: No armor quest is easier then Crafted... They d have to nerf that first. Taneran Dreamweaver Class Jax Bard of the 34th song [Prexus]
ygData.messageBody:
No armor quest is easier then Crafted... They'd have to nerf that first.

Taneran Dreamweaver
Class Jax
Bard of the 34th song
[Prexus]

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Burke [mailto:tjohnburke@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 30, 1999 12:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] I feel a nerf a coming...
>
>
> Just checked EQVault, and there is a post from Gordon about quest
> armor. Said something about the quest armor being more difficult
> for some classes than others, and expect changes in the next few
> patches. Ya'll smell that nerf headed straight for us, or am I
> just paranoid?
>
> My pally friend cries bloody freakin' murder everytime I ask him
> to help me to get another piece of lambent.
>
> Also, did anybody notice shields on barbarians? How come they
> fixed the shield graphic, but we are still strumming a stick, and
> not banging our my drums all day?
>
> Sorry if this sounds like whinny...
>
> Kerouac Dharmabum
> lvl 30 - Rodcent Nife
>
>
> [Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
